entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add `ThrowIfEmpty(Guid)` method to ArgumentException #97279
  • SignedXml does not work by default in trimmed applications #97274
    Future
  • False positives for IL3050, despite runtime feature checks #97273
  • NativeAOT: Assertion failed '!"Unhandled must expand intrinsic, throwing PlatformNotSupportedException"' in Checked mode #97272
    9.0.0
  • Generate DLLs whit wrong arch when cross build regression test #97265
  • docker pull mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:6.0 Error response from daemon: received unexpected HTTP status: 503 Service Unavailable #97263
  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests failed on browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests_Threading_Smoke CI leg #97260
  • ReadAsStreamAsync_HandlerProducesWellBehavedResponseStream test failure on release coreclr windows x64 Debug CI leg #97259

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add analyzer to remind of awaits without ConfigureAwait(false) #97275
  • System.InvalidOperationException on custum Content-Type for HttpClient #97271
  • System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() causes System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException #97261
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Xml.Tests.TC_SchemaSet_Add_URL.v4 #75123
    9.0.0
  • Runtime Identifiers not recognized. #97266

PullRequests

Created

  • STJ: Use base getter as fallback solution #97280
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Unconditionally enable `EETypeNode.SupportsWritableData` #97278
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Issue 96277: Order by memory footprint #97277
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Fix an llvm assertion. #97276
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [browser][mt] Run all tests #97270
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Linux/ARM bring-up (4/n) #97269
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoiding loading and processing same cert file to improve cold start performance … #97267
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • NativeAot: Enable GC event tracing on standalone GC #97257
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 120.0.6099.224, windows: 120.0.6099.225 #97256
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Revert pr#96099 #97264
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Get rid of `EETypePtr` #97207
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update TestsManifestGeneration.Etw.cs #97258
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, disabled-test, 9.0.0
  • Add public APIs for persisted AssemblyBulder #97177
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Rewrite offending test #97118
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Add lots more TensorPrimitives operations #97192
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][jit] Reenable branch optimizations when running with llvm. #97189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Remove old loop code #97232
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up and consolidate HostModel tests. #97244
    test-enhancement, area-HostModel
  • Switch RuntimeProperties host test to pre-built test assets #97245
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Optimize unboxing in `System.Data.Common.ObjectStorage:Set` #91945
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Convert Array.CopySlow to managed #97202
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono]: Reduce Mono AOT cross compiler x64 memory footprint. #97096
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Investigate EETypePtr overhead #232

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Don't use `mmap` in the frozen object manager and enable writeable data #2492

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement most of globalization #2490
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608
  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • IDE0055 triggered over collection expressions (but not array initializers) #70951
    17.9

Updated

  • Create an option in the new EditorConfig UI to toggle between the text editor and designer views #53120
    17.6 P3

PullRequests

Updated

  • Use Regex source generator in compiler #71721
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor][Wasm]: add support for customizing the logout process by allowing us to pass additional hints (throught qs parameters) #53521
  • [CRITICAL BUG] [REGRESSION] Problem when variables have the same name with differnt casing in blazor/net8 #53520
  • Documentation conflict - #53519
  • SignalR - Blazor Server - .Net7.0 Connection Disconnected #53517
  • [Question][Blazorhybrid] How can i use Custom Elements in blazor Hybrid application? #53516
  • <StaticWebAssetsEnabled>false</StaticWebAssetsEnabled> causes an error #53515
  • Values for all bound parameters are re-evaluated when a single parameter with two-way binding is changed. #53514

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] [Regression] ListView items disappear and reappear randomly when removing items from the list #20046
  • [Android] RotateYTo - wrong perspective rendering in Android #20044
  • CollectionView for WinUI flicker problem in 8.0.6 #20043
  • [iOS] ScrollView stretched beyond the Border of the Screen in Landscape Orientation with HorizontalOptions="StartAndExpand" #20042
  • Add Invalidate(Rect) to GraphicsView #20041
  • [iOS] Threshold for SwipeGestureRecognizer doesn't work #20039
  • [Android] StackLayout HorizontalOptions "StartAndExpand" not applied correctly within CollectionView GroupHeader DataTemplate #20038
  • Application Crash Issue with Data Binding in .NET MAUI 8 CollectionView and ObservableCollection #20037
  • Shell navigation bar flickering during refresh (animation transition) after the menu/flyout item selection #20035

Closed

  • NavigationPage breaks after some navigation forth and back #20032

PullRequests

Created

  • [WinUI] Fix DateTimeFormatter for "ddd" #20045
  • Batch CollectionChanged events via ObservableRangeCollection #20036
    community ✨
  • Optimize performance of Flex.Item #20034
    community ✨

Merged

  • Remove unused functions #20029
    community ✨

Updated

  • Make sure we support keyed services in client apps #20014
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Resizetizer Regex Fix #19600
    area/single project ☝️, community ✨
  • Make `PointerOver` to have higher priority than `Focused` state #19812
    community ✨
  • Optimize GetVisualTreeElementsWindowsInternal #19984
    community ✨
  • Optimize resetting gesture recognizers #19987
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    community ✨
  • Optimize Thickness and CornerRadius converters #20033
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
